founderNote.title: From Peter Pitcher
founderNote.content: I've been where you are: inconsistent trade, rising costs, and not enough time. The Anchor forced us to build better systems quickly. Now I help other operators apply the same action-first approach with practical support that works in real pub life.

faqs.question: How quickly can you help me?
faqs.answer: Message me anytime. I'll get back as quickly as I can, but bear with me if I'm in service. We'll have an initial chat and map your 30-day action plan.

faqs.question: What if I can't afford help right now?
faqs.answer: I understand - cash flow is tight. That's why I charge hourly (¬£75) rather than huge upfront fees. Start small for quick wins and scale as the results land.

faqs.question: Do you work with all types of pubs?
faqs.answer: Yes - from traditional locals to gastropubs, sports bars to country inns. The principles are the same: fill seats, increase spend, reduce costs, save time. I adapt strategies to your specific pub type and customer base.

faqs.question: What makes you different from other consultants?
faqs.answer: Billy runs The Anchor day-to-day and I handle marketing and business development. Every strategy I recommend has been tested at The Anchor first. I'm not a consultant who's never pulled a pint - I'm dealing with the same challenges you are.

faqs.question: What if your strategies don't work for my pub?
faqs.answer: That's why I stay closely involved during the first month. We review progress every week, adjust fast, and keep at it until the numbers move. I'll stick with you to make sure the plan delivers measurable results.
